description: Ministry of Megapolis  Western Pprovince - Sri Lanka  Reclamation and Development Corporation Amended Act No. 35 of 2006,  Act No. 52 of 1982 and  Act No. 27 of  1976 order under section 2(b) 1 - Ratnapura District area of low land marshe, barren or muddy lands R1-R38 and Kegalle District area of Low lands marshe, barren or muddy lands Ke1-Ke31
